name: Dice Dash (wylder fischotter)
description:
A game about a tiny moving dice. Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

 A simple puzzle game: Just move the dice to the orange target so that the number indicated on the target appears at the top of the cube.

Controls: WASD / Arrow-Keys to move the dice, R to reset the level, ESC to go back to the main menu
